fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / HARDIE AUTHORITY WC
fields.Description: THE WHITE CHECK TO GET TO KLAASJE

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""First you tell me someone's been *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First you tell me someone's been *raped*, and then you don't say *who*. That's bullshit!" (Stomp your feet.)

fields.Title: Authority: "Everyone can see you picked some wr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everyone can see you picked some wrong options. Next time you have to come up with better things to say.

fields.Title: The Gardener: ""Of course he's racist. Look at how..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course he's racist. Look at how fat he is."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened?" the lieutenant hal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened?" the lieutenant half-whispers, "We got absolutely *wiped*. Let's go before it gets worse."

fields.Title: Authority: "There is no 'back'."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no 'back'.

fields.Title: You: ""I see. Another question?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I see. Another question?"
fields.Alternate1: "I see, okay. That's cool, that's cool. Another question?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Speak for yourself, buddy." He put..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speak for yourself, buddy." He puts the beer down. "We've been giving shit for *ten years*! Martinaise was a dump before we put this outfit together."

fields.Title: Authority: "Not quite there yet -- push on."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not quite there yet -- push on.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You wanna talk to her, cop? Fine...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You wanna talk to her, cop? Fine. I'm gonna let you talk to her. But you treat her with respect."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you, we'll talk to her." (Co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, we'll talk to her." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah -- blonde. Tall. Two rooms ov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- blonde. Tall. Two rooms over from yours." He nods upstairs.

fields.Title: Jump to: [LYNCHUBENDGAME]
Titus Hardie: ""You mean Revachol? Nah. She's an i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean Revachol? Nah. She's an immigrant or a drifter of some sort. Been staying here over the winter."
fields.Alternate1: "You mean Revachol? Nah. Our Miss Oranje Disco Dancer is an immigrant or a drifter of some sort. Been staying here over the winter."

fields.Title: You: ""Sex, drugs, *and* karaoke?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sex, drugs, *and* karaoke?"

You: ""This doesn't concern you, cafeteri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This doesn't concern you, cafeteria manager!"

fields.Title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""What is your...?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is your...?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""And what exactly is it you've been..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And what exactly is it you've been doing that's so god damn special -- shitting yourself in front of us?" He leans in. "Going around harassing kids on the street? Kids who've done nothing wrong?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""I can believe that." He nods. "Car..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can believe that." He nods. "Carly works in a gun shop, you see."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Fellas..." The big guy glances ove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fellas..." The big guy glances over his shoulders. "You getting any of this?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What in the name of mother-fuck......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "What in the name of mother-fuck..." He looks closer, squinting at you.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub (03)]
Theo: ""No," a calm voice from the back of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," a calm voice from the back of the room: "He'll do it. Go ahead, son -- three, two..."

fields.Title: Alain: ""Yeah, 'cause I sorta *wanna* see t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, 'cause I sorta *wanna* see that shit."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Let's go back to normal. Let'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Let's go back to normal. Let's pretend this never happened."

fields.Title: Authority: "Don't let him drink that. One more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't let him drink that. One more push, quick!

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Klaasje Amandou. She's staying her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje Amandou. She's staying here at the Whirling-in-Rags. A real pretty one, silvery jumpsuit, blonde." Titus adjusts his cap. "That's Amandou with an O-U."

fields.Title: Jump to: [LYNCHUBENDGAME]
Authority: "What happened? You got your ass han..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What happened? You got your ass handed to you. You should have made the gun work! How are you going to get out of this now?

fields.Title: Composure: "He tries to make it sound real casu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He tries to make it sound real casual -- but the muscles on his neck tighten.

fields.Title: Volition: "I'm afraid it's not what *you* thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm afraid it's not what *you* think it is either.

fields.Title: Untitled hub
You: ""I haven't said anything racist!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I haven't said anything racist!"

fields.Title: Volition: "There is no rally, c'mon. Just ask..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no rally, c'mon. Just ask questions, you need to put this race rally garbage in the rear-view mirror.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What in the name of *fuck* are you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What in the name of *fuck* are you doing?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But..." The lieutenant looks worri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But..." The lieutenant looks worried, he whispers: "I don't want to give you my gun. Not after the last time."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your fingers wrap around the handle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your fingers wrap around the handle, the index slides into the trigger loop. Do it. Go on!

fields.Title: You: ""I'm going to kill myself now, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm going to kill myself now, you fucking whore." (Pull the trigger.)

fields.Dialogue Text: No! Give it to Lieutenant Kitsuragi. It's not too late -- you can still spin this as some kind of tactic.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Inside the small mechanism, you can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inside the small mechanism, you can hear a spring tensing up...

fields.Title: Authority: "Two! One! Do it, get this *one* thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two! One! Do it, get this *one* thing right.

fields.Title: Authority: "There will be no *spinning*. Do the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There will be no *spinning*. Do the *honest* thing! Pull the trigger!

fields.Title: You: ""Congratulations. All I see is you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Congratulations. All I see is you sitting around talking about *Monica's titties* -- while there's a rape victim."

fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're saying the two of you were... close?"

fields.Dialogue Text: And what was up with the *partying* she and Titus did? It sounded fun.

You: ""Everybody calm down! This is only..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everybody calm down! This is only a demonstration!" (Turn to Kim.) "Kim, the gun please?"

fields.Title: Authority: "He's had enough. He's really gonna..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's had enough. He's really gonna push their buttons now.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, I'm only getting total garbag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, I'm only getting total garbage here." (Whisper) "Please help."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Stop shitting your pants. You don'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop shitting your pants. You don't *need* to know, alright? We took care of it."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What, now you're in some kind of *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What, now you're in some kind of *personal crisis* -- right in front of us?" He seems taken aback by this sudden display of weakness. "Take this esoteric shit out of my bar!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We are deep, *deep* in farce terri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We are deep, *deep* in farce territory," the lieutenant whispers to you, taking a step closer to the door. "We need to cool off and re-engage, *later*."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Of course you have! You've been ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course you have! You've been calling people kipt left and right, inciting *race violence* in my town."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Get the fuck out of here, you raci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Get the fuck out of here, you racist carnie." Titus points at the door. "There'll be no race rally in my town."

fields.Title: Authority: "You got shredded to pieces there! S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You got shredded to pieces there! Should've gone with the gun, what were you thinking?!

fields.Title: Half Light: "Oh my god, not this again! No! Your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh my god, not this again! No! Your cheeks are burning red and you're sweating profusely...

fields.Title: You: ""You better get ready to fucking re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You better get ready to fucking respect me in: five, four, three..."

fields.Title: You: "Put the barrel in your mouth."
fields.Dialogue Text: Put the barrel in your mouth.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Genuine panic flies across the lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Genuine panic flies across the lieutenant's face.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you." He returns it to his h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you." He returns it to his holster, then looks at the room: "Nothing to worry about here, people -- my partner likes to play these jokes. He's what you call *dark*."
fields.Alternate1: "You promised it would make sense, but It didn't make sense at all." He returns the gun to its holster and addresses the room: "Nothing to worry about here, people -- my partner likes to play these jokes. He's what you call *dark*."

fields.Title: The Gardener: ""Do not think your *failed suicide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do not think your *failed suicide attempt* will win you any pity from these men -- do not expect them to forget it soon either."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Yes! Get the serotonine running. Ke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes! Get the serotonine running. Keeps those bad thoughts away.

fields.Title: You: ""I've asked this before -- why are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've asked this before -- why are you hiding the victim?!"

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
Shanky: ""It was like that karaoke incident..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was like that karaoke incident all over again. Or like some of the other girls he was harassing."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You saying we don't *help* people?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You saying we don't *help* people?" He puts the beer down. "I've been doing this job for *ten years*! Martinaise was a dump before we put this outfit together."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""So long as you treat her with *res..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So long as you treat her with *respect*. No questioning, no harassing -- or you got the freight train of pain heading your way." He grinds his fist into his palm. "You understand?"

Variable["pier.cindy_main_hub_reached"]
!(Variable["pier.cindy_main_hub_reached"])
You: ""What is *your* relationship with h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is *your* relationship with her?"
fields.Alternate1: "So..." (Scratch your head.) "What is your relationship with her?"

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Titus is hiding nothing." She turn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus is hiding nothing." She turns to the hulk of a man. "Titus..."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Man, I've been to Jamrock. The pla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man, I've been to Jamrock. The place looks like a modern painting. Kids as old as ten with guns on the street -- you got eight different mobs vying for power..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is her name?" The lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is her name?" The lieutenant takes out his notes.

fields.Title: You: ""Miss Oranje Disco Dancer?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Miss Oranje Disco Dancer?"

fields.Title: You: ""Alright.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright."
fields.Alternate1: "Alright, alright, we don't need to know."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah. We did them. What's that to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. We did them. What's that to you?"

fields.Title: You: "(Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, I n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, I need your gun."

fields.Title: Authority: "This is not what he thinks it is --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not what he thinks it is -- this is a great idea.

fields.Title: You: ""You're not the law. I am the law!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not the law. I am the law!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I assure you, there is no crisis,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I assure you, there is no crisis," the lieutenant tries to salvage the situation. "We had questions, that's all."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""Wait, *what*?!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, *what*?!"

fields.Title: You: ""I haven't harassed any kids!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I haven't harassed any kids!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Titus Hardie: ""I can believe that. That rings tru..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can believe that. That rings true to me." He nods. "Carly works in the kindergarten, right?"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""I knew he wasn't gonna do it, thou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knew he wasn't gonna do it, though! I knew he'd pussy out!"

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Titus..." He looks at her."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus..." He looks at her.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""You seen Apricot -- old Pidieu's d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seen Apricot -- old Pidieu's daughter?" asks Lieutentant McCoy. "Uh-huh," replies Torson. "The ass on that one..." McCoy shakes his head in appreciation. "A bit strange the old man named her Apricot, but, I mean -- who am I to judge? Wanna hit the kebab joint?"

fields.Title: You: "(Nod.) "What is her name?""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Nod.) "What is her name?"

CheckItem("gun_villiers")
!(CheckItem("gun_villiers"))
Half Light: "Sounds like someone's dam broke."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds like someone's dam broke.

fields.Title: Authority: "What's going on, are you a racist n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's going on, are you a racist now? Is the rally real? Please don't set up any rally, it'll make you look awful!

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Yeah, Carly said you've been hangi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, Carly said you've been hanging around the day-care centre. In the bushes, man. By the jungle-gym. Tryna' set up some weird field trip to your station, that's in your home..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is no Carly and there is no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no Carly and there is no kindergarten," the lieutenant says to you, concerned you might not get it. "It's a joke and we're getting derailed."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
You: ""There is no other way.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no other way."

fields.Title: You: "But I want to point it at *them*."
fields.Dialogue Text: But I want to point it at *them*.

fields.Title: Untitled hub (03)
Horrific Necktie: "*Bratan*, we can't have any fun if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Bratan*, we can't have any fun if you kill yourself. Painting the booth red with your brains sounds like a real blast now -- but what about later? There'll be nothing.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Dark?" The big guy bursts out laug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Dark?" The big guy bursts out laughing. "What the fuck was that, you carnies? We haven't seen RCM in four years and *this* shows up!"

fields.Title: Theo: ""No, no. I still have my money on h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no. I still have my money on him." The old man pulls on his cigarette, slowly. "Sooner or later -- he has that look."

fields.Title: You: ""Ha-ha everyone. Did you like my fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha-ha everyone. Did you like my funny joke?"

fields.Title: The Gardener: ""Do not think your *failed suicide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do not think your *failed suicide attempt* will win you any pity from these men. Do not expect them to forget it either."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He is infinitely grateful to have t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is infinitely grateful to have that gun back on his belt right now.

fields.Title: Jump to: [AUTHORITYWC FAIL HUB]
You: ""So she's not from around here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So she's not from around here?"

fields.Title: LYNCHUBENDGAME
Titus Hardie: ""What do you think I meant?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think I meant?"

fields.Title: Glen: ""Shut up, Angie!" He slaps his fore..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shut up, Angie!" He slaps his forehead. "She doesn't need your help..."

Variable["whirling.hardie_failed_authority_wc_third_time"]
!(Variable["whirling.hardie_failed_authority_wc_third_time"])
Authority: "You have *so* many bad options rule..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have *so* many bad options ruled out it's *insane*! There is no way in the world you won't do it this time!

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Carly said they've been trying to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Carly said they've been trying to set up a *race rally*, whatever the fuck that means. Trying to get the *kipts* out of Revachol, before the economy goes to shit..."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Shit, boss, he actually *is* racis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shit, boss, he actually *is* racist!"

fields.Title: Variable["yard.cuno_punchhub_reached"]
Variable["yard.cuno_punchhub_reached"]
!(Variable["yard.cuno_punchhub_reached"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Police job?" He tilts his head to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Police job?" He tilts his head to the side, as if inspecting you. A brief moment passes. In silence. Then...

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "He rubs his left temple. "If you mu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He rubs his left temple. "If you must."

fields.Title: Drama: "Everybody has something to hide. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everybody has something to hide. He *certainly* does.

fields.Title: Eugene: ""They didn't see shit, man," he tur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They didn't see shit, man," he turns to you. "Kids getting shot, we had three shootings a week, fuckin' graffito everywhere -- you cops haven't shown up since the Thirties."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Remember what I said: freight trai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Remember what I said: freight train of pain." He points his beer can at you.

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
Suggestion: "Whatever you do, do not to tell him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever you do, do not to tell him you *know her*. That would sound *off*.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "What's with all the silences? It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's with all the silences? It's like these guys don't know how to feel about this. You should keep picking at it...

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Suggestion: "He really went out of his way to se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He really went out of his way to seem comfortable with this topic. That's all you're gonna get for now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Live in a bar. Sit on their fat as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Live in a bar. Sit on their fat asses like they own the place, while the neighbourhood goes to shit, corpses hang from trees, kids shoot up..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""EVERYONE SHUT UP!!!" Titus's loud..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "EVERYONE SHUT UP!!!" Titus's loud baritone echoes back from the mess hall walls and the entire cafeteria falls silent.

fields.Title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""For god's sake, stop SHOUTING!" Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For god's sake, stop SHOUTING!" The man behind the counter shouts. "Stop crashing into people in my establishment! Stop provoking those oafs!"

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe you're right. Maybe I'm not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe you're right. Maybe I'm not the law after all." (To yourself.)  "Maybe everyone's been lying to me..."

fields.Title: You: ""Shut up, barman!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shut up, barman!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, babes. What is this?" Titus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, babes. What is this?" Titus spreads his arms, smiling gently. "I can't have a slap-fight in my bar. It's embarrassing."
fields.Alternate1: "Easy, babes. What is this?" Titus spreads his arms, smiling gently. "I can't have a slap-fight in my bar. It's embarrassing. Take it outside, will you?"

fields.Dialogue Text: "Carly said they've been trying to set up a mass execution." He shakes his head in disdain. "Bulk-purchasing guns. Ammunition, too."

IsKimHere()

Kim Kitsuragi: ""Merely *what*...?" He doesn't quit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Merely *what*...?" He doesn't quite catch that last word. A brief moment passes in silence, then...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective." He thinks of putting h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective." He thinks of putting his hand on your shoulder, then doesn't. "We don't have to demonstrate anything, let's just get back to the questions."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Silence. He tilts his head to the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Silence. He tilts his head to the side, inspecting you. A brief moment passes, then...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you." He quickly returns the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you." He quickly returns the gun to his holster, then looks at the room. "So -- questions?"

fields.Dialogue Text: "Trust me, Kim. I am merely flesh."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, Shanks..." The leader gestur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, Shanks..." The leader gestures for him to stand down. "I want to see where this is going."

fields.Title: Authority: "*I want to point it at them*, phah!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *I want to point it at them*, phah! Quit your whining.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's desperately trying to offer a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's desperately trying to offer a counter-narrative. There is none.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You don't know her.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't know her."

fields.Title: You: ""You must be -- you're just like re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You must be -- you're just like real cops. Drinking beer and sitting around with your dicks in your hand."

fields.Title: You: ""I think I know her.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I know her."
fields.Alternate1: "I think I..." (Laugh nervously.) "I think I know her."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. How well?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. How well?"
fields.Alternate1: "Oh, okay, cool, cool. How well though?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Well enough, copper. We partied. S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well enough, copper. We partied. She's been here for a few months." He crosses his arms.

fields.Title: You: ""Another question.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Another question."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamnit, get it over with alread..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamnit, get it over with already..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Sure -- why not. You've probably s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure -- why not. You've probably seen her around." He nods upstairs.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Oh, it's her. It's definitely her...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, it's her. It's definitely her. It's Miss Oranje Disco Dancer.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Calm. Normal. Try to forget this *l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Calm. Normal. Try to forget this *little hiccup*.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, enough about it then." (Conc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, enough about it then." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Authority: "Well... The rest of that nancy stuf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well... The rest of that nancy stuff was really just there to make the gun thing more appealing. But it might work anyway.

fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck you man!" his eyes are fixed on Kim. "You didn't see the place before we got here. Fucking... graffito everywhere..."

fields.Title: Glen: ""Hey, we don't have to fucking take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, we don't have to fucking take this shit..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No, asshole -- *you're* nobody. *I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, asshole -- *you're* nobody. *I'm* the law!"

fields.Title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""They're not going to give you *any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're not going to give you *anything*, can't you see?! I can't have a *police interrogation* in here. People are trying to eat..."

fields.Title: Authority: "You don't have to be the butt of ev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't have to be the butt of every joke. You're making the lieutenant look bad. Just stick to what you know. Guns.

fields.Title: Half Light: "The pressure in the room grows to a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pressure in the room grows to a boiling point.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not fucking this case up!" (Fi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not fucking this case up!" (Finger on the trigger.) "You *will* respect me!"

fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh?"

fields.Title: Authority: "You believe the place was called *P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You believe the place was called *Precinct 41* -- it was also filled with (almost exclusively) *men*, sitting on desks, talking shit and wasting time.

fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus..." He looks at her.

Authority: "There is little left to salvage......"
fields.Dialogue Text: There is little left to salvage... Did I not tell you to pick the *right* option?

fields.Title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""Stop yelling about the god damn la..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop yelling about the god damn law in my establishment!" the cafeteria manager interrupts with his voice raised to a squeak. "We get it, you're *all* the law!"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not shitting myself!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not shitting myself!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What are you talking about? Guns a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you talking about? Guns are the only thing you have! Waving them around old ladies' faces. Trying to gun down kids..."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. That is not what is happening...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. That is not what is happening." He turns to you. "This *show* is unnecessary. Give me my gun. Now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Again -- it was a dark joke." He t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Again -- it was a dark joke." He turns to you. "Maybe we should go for a little walk, joker? Before we continue? Jogging around seems to have a positive effect on you."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""How well do you *know* her?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How well do you *know* her?"

fields.Title: Untitled hub
You: ""No, I'm also a big fan of beer --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I'm also a big fan of beer -- *and* jerking off instead of helping people."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""They don't know, man. They weren't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They don't know, man. They weren't here." He turns to you. "We had three shootings a week, kids dead, fuckin' graffito everywhere... You cops haven't shown up since the Thirties."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Actually, the graffito isn't *quite..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, the graffito isn't *quite* off yet is it?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing." He gives you a sideways..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing." He gives you a sideways glance. "We just have a *few* more questions -- then we'll be on our way."

fields.Title: Composure: "You inexplicably add "cool" after t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You inexplicably add "cool" after the victim's name -- with your eyes bulging like some wild beast. Your fingers are fidgeting and sweat starts forming on your brow as Titus looks at you oddly.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs?! That can't be her. She knows you drank so hard you forgot you were a cop...

fields.Title: Glen: ""You don't have a beer in your hand..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't have a beer in your hand." The tall blond throws Titus a can. "Here you go!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [LYNCHUBENDGAME]
Titus Hardie: ""Yeah. Pretty much.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. Pretty much."

fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not scared anymore. I know what I have to do."

fields.Dialogue Text: "Why? You have your own gun."

fields.Title: You: ""I guess we're both the law around..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess we're both the law around here, if you start to think about it."

fields.Dialogue Text: "Of *course* it concerns me if you make this kind of..."

fields.Title: You: ""That's a lie! There is no 'race ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a lie! There is no 'race rally'!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Get the fuck out of here, you race..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Get the fuck out of here, you race war asshole. We're not gonna march in your rally, stop trying to recruit us."

fields.Dialogue Text: "The fuck is happening, Titus? What are they whispering about?"

fields.Title: You: ""I know what I'm doing. It's not my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know what I'm doing. It's not my first day on the police-job."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be careful -- it's loaded." He unh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Be careful -- it's loaded." He unholsters and gives you his firearm. It feels oddly light and buzzing in your hand. Like a funny toy.

fields.Title: Authority: "*Everyone* knows how to do that! Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Everyone* knows how to do that! You're a special man. You're going to point it at *yourself*. Go ahead, show them.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "*Kisses... kisses... kisses...*"
fields.Dialogue Text: *Kisses... kisses... kisses...*

fields.Title: You: ""I need Kim and his gun here for my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need Kim and his gun here for my *demonstration*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Congratulations on the graffito re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Congratulations on the graffito removal." He turns to Titus. "All I see is you sitting around talking about *Monica's titties* -- while there's a rape victim."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""He did it before we killed him. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He did it before we killed him. He's not gonna do it again." He crushes his half-empty beer can. "So what does it matter?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Suggestion: "Whatever you do, do not to tell him..."]
Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""No," he whispers, not even looking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," he whispers, not even looking at you. "Not going to happen."

fields.Title: You: ""That's fucking right, no need to h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's fucking right, no need to hide anymore -- I'm a proud Revacholian!"

fields.Title: Authority: "This time it's going to work. You a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This time it's going to work. You already ruled out the first, *bad* option that didn't.

fields.Title: Authority: "Okay, this time... is FOR REAL. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, this time... is FOR REAL. You have *two* bad options ruled out -- the odds are on your side!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods and turns to ad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods and turns to address the room: "You know what? You guys *must* be the cops. Because this is what cops do, right?"

fields.Title: You: "That's it? That's all I got?"
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it? That's all I got?

fields.Title: You: ""I don't even have a gun!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't even have a gun!"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Authority: "What happened? You got your ass han..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What happened? You got your ass handed to you. Always go with the gun! How are you going to get out of this now?

fields.Title: Volition: "Yes -- you. Stop talking out loud,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes -- you. Stop talking out loud, you sound like you're unravelling.

fields.Title: Authority: "Good. Now put it in your mouth."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good. Now put it in your mouth.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "There's just this *itch*, deep unde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's just this *itch*, deep under your skull, where you've never reached. Never scratched...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ehm...""
You: ""You may have missed a spot there w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You may have missed a spot there with the graffito."

fields.Title: You: ""I get it, Titus. You guys really a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I get it, Titus. You guys really are *the authority* around here."

fields.Title: You: ""What was her relationship with the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was her relationship with the mercenary?"
fields.Alternate1: "Uh... so what was her relationship with the mercenary?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [LYNCHUBENDGAME]
Suggestion: "What are you talking about? Don't s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you talking about? Don't say that, this is no time to nitpick.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Titus Hardie: ""So what? What do you want from me?..."]
Composure: "You inexplicably add "cool" after t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You inexplicably add "cool" after the victim's name -- but no one notices. Your spine is too damn straight. None of these people would ever suspect you've met her.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No. We just fucked, that's all," h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. We just fucked, that's all," he states matter-of-factly. "I'm not gonna give you any details if that's what you're after. So put your dick away."

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.klaasje_i_wanna_have_fuck_with_you"]
Variable["whirling.klaasje_i_wanna_have_fuck_with_you"]
!(Variable["whirling.klaasje_i_wanna_have_fuck_with_you"])
Inland Empire: "Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs?! That can't be her! Remember what you said to her? You told you wanna have...

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yes -- yes -- and no." He looks yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- yes -- and no." He looks you straight in the eye. "Got something to say about it?"

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Authority: "Establish authority, yes! AUTHORITY..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Establish authority, yes! AUTHORITY! Feverish thoughts race through your mind.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Glen...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Glen..."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhm..." He hesitates. "And what *i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm..." He hesitates. "And what *is* that?"

fields.Title: Eugene: ""The fuck is he saying?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fuck is he saying?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. Give me the gun.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Give me the gun."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""The fuck are you talkin' about --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fuck are you talkin' about -- gun?" He asks angrily. "No one's gonna let you wave a gun around here."

fields.Title: You: ""No, no. I'm drunk on the job too...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no. I'm drunk on the job too. I don't give a shit, just like you guys."
fields.Alternate1: "No, no! I got drunk so drunk I drove my car to the sea. I don't give a shit either, just like you guys."
fields.Alternate2: "No, no! I like to get drunk and then do racial profiling. I don't give a shit either, just like you guys."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Titus Hardie: ""If you don't -- if you *question*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you don't -- if you *question* her, harass her..." Titus taps his chin with his fist. "...a freight train of pain, buddy."

fields.Title: You: ""You said you partied. What did you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said you partied. What did you mean?"
fields.Alternate1: "You said you partied. Cool, that's cool. But what did you mean?"

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")
Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")
!(Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie"))
You: ""We could establish a timeline.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We could establish a timeline."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Alright. Two weeks maybe? I don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright. Two weeks maybe? I don't know... I need another beer." He turns to Glen.

fields.Title: You: ""Drugs?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Drugs?"
